Name: owncloud-client
Overview: Dockerized ownCloud CLI Client (owncloudcmd) to sync from any supported ownCloud-like (e.g. TransIP STACK, NextCloud) enviroment.

OC_PASS.Name: OC_PASS
OC_PASS.Description: Password or App-Token for the ownCloud user

OC_SERVER.Name: OC_SERVER
OC_SERVER.Description: ownCloud Server URL, with, if necessary, with port

OC_URLPATH.Name: OC_URLPATH
OC_URLPATH.Description: Server path to the ownCloud instance

OC_FILEPATH.Name: OC_FILEPATH
OC_FILEPATH.Description: Only sync one specific folder. Use '/' for everything

RUN_UID.Name: RUN_UID
RUN_UID.Description: UID for the occlient user and sync location

RUN_GID.Name: RUN_GID
RUN_GID.Description: GID for the occlient user and sync location

OC_WEBDAV.Name: OC_WEBDAV
OC_WEBDAV.Description: In case the webdav path is not default, you can change it here

TRUST_SELFSIGN.Name: TRUST_SELFSIGN
TRUST_SELFSIGN.Description: Set to 1 to trust self-signed certificates

SYNC_HIDDEN.Name: SYNC_HIDDEN
SYNC_HIDDEN.Description: Set to 1 to sync all hidden files within the specified ownCloud directory

SILENCE_OUTPUT.Name: SILENCE_OUTPUT
SILENCE_OUTPUT.Description: Set to 0 to get more verbose output

RUN_INTERVAL.Name: RUN_INTERVAL
RUN_INTERVAL.Description: Interval in seconds at which the client will run and check for changes

Sync Location.Name: Sync Location
Sync Location.Description: The path where the files will be synced to
